    • Method Detail

      • showCommentList

        java.util.List<Comment> showCommentList(java.lang.String statusId)
        This method finds all comments for this status according to the status id entered.
        Parameters:
        statusId, - The id of Status
        Returns:
        List of Comment , All comments in the tb_comment, that the status_id is same as params.
        LastEditDate:
        2023-1-14

      • postComment

        boolean postComment(java.lang.String statusId,
                    java.lang.String msg,
                    java.lang.String sid)
        This method combines the input parameters into a comment and uploads it to the database.
        Parameters:
        statusId - ,The id of Status
        sid - , The id of user who send this comment
        msg - , The message who want to send
        Returns:
        boolean, If it is true, the comment is sent successfully. If it is false, the comment is sent failed.
        LastEditDate:
        2023-1-14
        Editor:
        Yunzhou Liu
